tor.comment: Official Tor project build. URL has been stable.

gpg.comment: Long-standing windows GPG provider. URL has been stable.

openssl.comment: OpenSSL from a third-party maintainer. See list at https://wiki.openssl.org/index.php/Binaries

resource_hacker.comment: Official build from project. Project only provides one link for the current build--no history, so link has been volatile.

lessmsi.comment: Official build from lessmsi. Link has been stable.

python27.comment: Official build from python. Link has been stable.

wix.comment: Official build from wixtoolset. Link has been stable.
